name: Mini Mouse Macro

screenshots.caption: Record the macro and edit the entries one at a time or by selecting multiple
Create a custom entry with a whole word or sentence.

short_description:
Mini Mouse Macro hits over 100,000 downloads.
To celebrate the milestone here are some Pro discount vouchers:
50%MMMPro  (0 left)
25%MMMPro  (11 left)
15%MMMPro  (20 left)

Mini Mouse Macro is a great free mouse and keyboard recording macro.  Mini Mouse Macro if different to other mouse macro's out there because it can actively record your mouse movements, clicks and keys.  Lower standard macro's require you to actually enter the x and y position of your mouse and then ask you what to do.....Mini Mouse Macro recorder takes it to the next level by recording your actions in real time.

Another great feature of Mini Mouse Macro is the ability to save your macro's and load up whatever macro you need when you need it.

Certified 100% virus and malware free here: http://www.softpedia.com/get/System/System-Miscellaneous/Mini-Mouse-Macro.shtml

Check out current reviews and feedback at the turnssoft website:
http://www.turnssoft.com/your-mini-mouse-macro-feedback.html
summary: Light weight mouse and keyboard macro recording machine
